# controlPoints

**Instance Property**

An array containing the curve’s control points.

## Declaration

```swift
var controlPoints: [CHHapticParameterCurve.ControlPoint] { get }
```

## Describing the Curve

- **parameterID**: The parameter ID defining the type of parameter that the curve represents.
- **relativeTime**: The time at which this parameter curve is applied, relative to the start time of the pattern.
